job_description: As a developer you are responsible for our current websites.
Importantly, possesses a depth REACT JS knowledge with API Integration.

Knowledge of SEO principles and their application in ecommerce.
CI or Laravel experience as well as expertise with PHP or any other framework.
Excellent working knowledge of Web application development.
Conduct periodic user research (qualitative as well as quantitative methods including in-depth interviews) to understand user needs and to optimize UI/UX design…
You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application; therefore, a basic understanding of front-end…
A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices.
NET, Javascript or Ruby on Rails.
Contribute to design and development of revised application platform on basis of big data technologies that fit current and future data usage scenarios (think…
Collaborate with the web development team to fix website issues.
Knowledge of front-end technologies including CSS, HTML.
Graduate in any discipline.
Can you acknowledge that you are aware that this role will require frontend specific automation testing, as well as regular QA testing, including manual QA?
Collaborate with developers to understand their design requirements and project goals.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively…
Designing and implementing responsive WordPress websites using best practices.
Knowledge of WordPress security best practices and measures.
Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in WordPress development.
Mentorship and guidance from experienced WordPress developers.
